items.title: Trump wants to abolish the filibuster. GOP senators aren’t on board.
items.description: The president wants to end the filibuster to reopen the government and to do “so many things.”

items.title: Trump deportations, high prices propel Democratic gains with Latinos
items.description: Changes in who turned out to vote also factored in, adding to questions about whether Republicans can reprise Trump’s 2024 inroads in the midterms.
